questionsData.title: إذا كانت د(س) = ٢ س لو س   ؛  فإن د/ (س ) =  ٢ ( ١ + لو س )

answers_data.answer4: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:wrs="http://www.wiris.com/xml/mathml-extension" height="21" width="42" wrs:baseline="16"><!--MathML: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" dir="rtl"><mo>-</mo><mn>٤</mn><mo> </mo><mi>لو</mi><mn>٢</mn></math>--><defs><style type="text/css">@font-face{font-family:'math1da40657c9fece7e48d30af42d3';src:url(data:font/truetype;charset=utf-8;base64,)format('truetype');font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;}</style></defs><text font-family="math1da40657c9fece7e48d30af42d3" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" x="34.5" y="16">−</text><text font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" x="24.5" y="16">٤</text><text font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" x="12.5" y="16">لو</text><text font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" x="3.5" y="16">٢</text></svg>
